dmca.title: [ABUSE] Formula One A/V FOM_NRID11409
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, March 07, 2005 10:00 AM
To: christophers@nr-online.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Formula One A/V FOM_NRID11409

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1




Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: christophers@nr-online.com <christophers@nr-online.com>
To: <wibble2004@hotmail.com>
Date: Monday, March 7, 2005, 6:35:09 AM
Subject: [ABUSE] Formula One A/V FOM_NRID11409

===8<==============Original message text=============== NetResult Internal
Reference: FOM_NRID11409

Please quote the above FOM_NRID11409 reference in all communications with us
regarding this issue.

A/V content

We have noticed that your Web Site http://www.sportingstreams.com/ displayed
and offered Formula One? A/V content by way of live internet streaming.

Formula One Administrations Ltd ("FOA") is the sole proprietor world-wide of
all sound and moving picture rights in the FIA Formula One World
Championship? (including still images derived from the moving images) and as
such has the exclusive right to control, manage and exploit these rights.
All copyright in such images vests with FOA.

As you have neither sought nor obtained permission from FOA to use the A/V
content this use is an infringement of FOA's rights.  Please immediately
cease all such infringements on any and all of your web sites and confirm to
us via email that you have done so.

I confirm that FOA is the owner of the exclusive rights to the A/V content
referenced above and that NetResult is authorised to act on its behalf with
respect to internet monitoring and compliance. On behalf of FOA I hereby
state that I have a good faith belief that use of such A/V content in the
manner complained of is not authorised by FOA, its agent, or the law.

Please note that nothing in this letter is intended or shall be construed to
constitute an express or implied waiver of any of FOA's rights or remedies,
all of which are expressly reserved.


We thank you for your cooperation.


Yours faithfully,

Christopher Stokes


NetResult
A Division of Projector NetResult Ltd

Mulberry House
583 Fulham Road
London
UK SW6 5UA

Tel: +44 (0)20 7471 1731
Fax: +44 (0)7092 804032


Head Office: Projector NetResult Ltd, 8 Wye Street, Hereford, UK HR2 7RB

Please note, if this email has been sent to the wrong recipient, please
accept out apologies, inform us of the error, and forward this e-mail
immediately to the correct person or department for action.




===8<===========End of original message text=========== -----BEGIN PGP
SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFCLHp7vK/XpJs6oyURAsBoAJ9mxVCkdpjtRIyKoT3Kec8aoEjwuACglxjd
cKzyNUslua6VnmajZL/cu9Q=
=sZD2
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
